venue.name: Tavern in the Square - Central Square

item.description:
Hello,

The Beijing Olympic Opening Ceremonies will be televised on NBC on Friday August 8th starting at 8pm EST.

http://www.satellitet...

Let's get together and enjoy a few drinks (and possibly some food) cheering on our favorite countries. This promises to be a spectacular show.

You can arrive late since we cannot make reservations for tables on Friday night. Hope to see you there. Thanks to Aggeliki for suggesting this meetup.

China has invested heavily in these Olympics and the venues are very impressive.

http://en.beijing2008...

Here is the Tavern in the Square website.

http://www.taverninth...

Parking in Central Square is easy. Also there is a T stop.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask at the Front for the Euro Meetup - Joe ; my cell is 508-498-1651

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: Olympics & Drinks
